lines.text: Is he going to take an attack of opportunity on her?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, she's still staying in combat. She moved around him but is staying engaged but is currently looking to make another opening and then dive off back towards the stairs. Nott, sorry, your turn now.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, my turn. Do I need to first make a constitution save?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At the end of your turn.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: At the end of my turn, okay. I'll swim up and poke the thing with my shortsword.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Disadvantage on the attack.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh boy. Okay. What does this thing do? 15!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15 hits, and engaged with allies. You do get sneak attack damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh? I do?!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. It's engaged with Caduceus and Avantika.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh wow. Okay. That's 21 points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How do you want to do this?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Because it can't see me, I'll go up and-- I don't use shortsword a lot, so I'll let it float for a second and grab it from behind and then rake it across the back of its neck.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Immediately, the water before you fills with crimson. You can see it thrash for a minute, its serpent arms trying to reach behind to strike at you. You swim away as they go limp, and it begins to float up. So that's that. You still have a little movement left.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to go towards the door as much as I can.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a constitution saving throw, please.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Not great. 12.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are not drowning yet, but you're on the cusp.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's my favorite condition: is not drowning yet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That ends your go, Nott. Caduceus, Caleb, and Jester, you're up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Full speed.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, the same with Jester. All the way up to the dome.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She's up with Fjord, and I need you to make a constitution saving throw for Jester.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Seven plus-- nine.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No. Seven plus two equals nine.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Shit!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: because you did cast a spell, Spirit Guardians, while underwater.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, yeah. That's fair, I did.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She rolled a nine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see her swimming. She's (choking) and begins kicking in the water before starting to--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I rolled an eight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You rolled an eight? Caduceus as well. They both swim towards the staircase and you see them both beginning to clutch at their throats.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can I cast-- I got a crazy idea.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You used your full movement to get there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Next turn can I try something?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Next turn, you'll be dead.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ending your go, Caleb, what are you doing?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So I have three ways to move. First way is the bonus action. Do I reach oxygen doing that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can get up to the front there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Does that get me to air?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It gets you to the last bit of air as it's about to hit the surface. At the end of this combat round, basically after Fjord, the chamber that Beau is in is now full. The water has filled the entirety of the temple.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So all the way to the tippy-top?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, balls. I'll use bonus action and movement to go as high as I can. Do I reach the trap door?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do reach the door.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I will pull out the wire from my spell components and try to jimmy to lock. Oh god, I don't know what to do! I'm underwater, yeah? So I still have action, so I'm going to try to open the lock.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Make a lock picking attempt.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This will be no problem, right?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Straight roll?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, disadvantage because you're underwater.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's a four.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, that's a failure. You're sticking, trying to get through it. No effect. Fjord, you're up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay. Looking around, still having plenty of air in my lungs, I turn around and see Jester starting to panic and I know that she has the key, so I will reach out and grab her face and bring her into a kiss, and I will blow all of my air into her lungs.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are you upside down right now?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Shape of Water!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, yes!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She is no longer drowning, but you have to make a con save at the end of your turn.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay. Fair enough.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's your action to do that. You breathe some of your air into her. You still have movement.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He selfishly wants the door unlocked--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll try and swim up towards the top.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You make it halfway up. Actually, no, because you have full move, don't you?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Full movement.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You get almost to the top. Not fully, but almost to the top. Constitution saving throw, please.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You, sir, are considered drowning.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I lost five of those hoo-has for casting a spell, you said, so do I need to make a constitution throw?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, you do.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, let's all die together. 13.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're fine. That brings around to the top there. Beau, the water fills the gap.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Take one last deep breath. Going to drop down and going to use that-- nope, the rope is attached to me. Going to drop down and see if I can go for Jester.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So you're going to pull Jester up? She's conscious, so you're going to get her closer?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, can I take her and yank her up with me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure. You go down. Takes you I'll say two movements to get down there and you pull her part way up. Are you using your ki point for step of the wind?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sure. My last ki point.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Last ki point will do that. That will get her halfway up the stairs because I'm saying pulling her, the dragging motion, is half movement. So that will get you down to her. Yeah, you'll get her part way up the stairs, about halfway up toward where the top chamber is.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That helps. Whatever I can do, I guess.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: If there was air where Beau was, wouldn't there be air where Caleb was?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, you were below me, I think.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm hasted almost, and I just blasted up to the top of the temple.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It did. Okay, no. I would say that there was enough air.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Then I would have (inhaling). Then I failed the lock picking.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That brings us to Yasha. Avantika has also swam up and Jamedi is now gathering as well. Jamedi and Avantika both grab Caduceus' body, who is drowning, and begin pulling him up the stairs behind them.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's good. That's nice of them.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yasha will head towards the door and wait for it to open. She's going to use her movement to go up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yasha gets up there to the top. Yasha's now in there, waiting there in the chamber. There's the gate below getting ready, looking around, trying to get people to move upward. That finishes her go. Nott.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will grab Jester's horns and pull and go up as fast as I can.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can attempt to bonus action dash.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Bonus action dash. Sure, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You get another 15 feet. You get her near the top of the staircase on the top floor. That ends your turn, Nott. Now it is Jester's, Caleb's, and Caduceus' turn. Caduceus. You are unconscious.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I am unconscious. Ah, man!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I need you to make a death save at the top of your turn. I need to keep reminding myself that death saves are at the top of the turn, not in the--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I know, I was just sitting on a spell that apparently I didn't know that I was going to lose the spell so I'm throwing away my plans. I had an emergency exit and now I can't use it. It's all right. Fuck it. 14.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Success on the save. That finishes Caduceus' turn. Caleb and Jester.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm taking a breath of air. Caleb would have just rebounded back down and swam. I use bonus action if that gets me to them, good. If not, I will use bonus action plus movement to get to them which I would assume it would get me there. Then I help Nott. I will continue to drag Jester up towards the surface.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Between all of you guys, Jester and you all manage to make your way up the top and Jester's turn-- Jester fumbles through her sack, pulls up the key and gets it. So--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So it works.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: First Poseidon movie, yeah!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Because all of this water pressure just built up at the top of this temple suddenly released as the latch and this geyser of water thrusts all of you rapidly out the top.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Money shot!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (groaning) Oh god!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You all get shot about a good 15, 20 feet up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, no.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have a look down at the temple, which you can now see these large cracks that have set in the sides where bits of water are pouring out through small cracks. Now this large geyser thrusts in the air and you all began to plummet and fall.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I cast Feather Fall on myself, on Nott, on Jester, on Beauregard, and on Fjord.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's my last spell slot.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Take Cad, take Cad! I'm good!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I already did it, it doesn't matter. It's what I did. It's who I know, not what hit points exist.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (cheering)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Thank god. That would have been the end of me.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That would have been it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Right there, instant T.K.O.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Perfect.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Fuck, man.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you all begin to drift down, the geyser slows, the pressure releases, but now water is just pouring out of the sides of the temple and it's completely flooding the city. You watch as yuan-ti that are rushing up the side of the temple are washed down into the basin that is now the center of the city streets. You can see now that the city is being thrust up the side. Some have moved to the top of buildings and are glancing up and seeing you guys as you begin to descend. Now you're about to hit the top of this, and there is now a perpetual flow of water coming out of the top of this temple. What are you going to do?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're about to hit the top of the temple, or all the sides of it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: On the sides of it. You guys are just slowly drifting down towards what's essentially a raging--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Water slide?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Rapid water slide on all ends.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It ends with the mob of angry people who want to kill us, probably?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I can see that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Jester at the very least is going to cast Spare the Dying-- is going to grab me in the Feather Fall and cast Spare the Dying.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Thank you!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm unconscious, I think.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't think you made it to unconsciousness because we burst before your turn.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay, okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, you're unconscious.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I started drowning.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But I don't know if you're making death saves. Is he stable?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You've begun drowning and you guys got thrust out, so you managed just catch your breath because it didn't come back to your turn yet. That very next turn, before Jester got it opened, you've would have been down.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you just caught your breath--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I did? Okay, okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The very last minute. Basically, as the darkness began to take your vision, you are thrust out and your eyes go wide again as you see this sunlight above you as your air rushes back into your lungs and then suddenly begin to drift slowly down looking below-- you can see the city and the entire landscape of this strange village below you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How the fuck do we get out of this?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So what are you guys doing?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: They are on all sides, the people down below, or are down on one side of them?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They are on all sides. Like the entire city surrounds the temple. You guys only came up on one side. The water is pouring down on all sides.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Let's us just get down and out of here.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, and I don't think that Spirit Guardians doesn't go down when I go unconscious.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Any spells that's concentration is lost.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's not concentration-- Oh it is concentration, isn't it? Where is it? Yeah, it is concentration. Fuck. God damn it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Let's just get back on the ship.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm paddling through the air towards the direction we came from.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Haul ass.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: A sled. Like a toboggan and hold it there so when he lands he'll just slide.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So as you all begin to slowly drift and try paddling your way through the air, I'm going to say for the purpose of this, we'll make this a group skill check. Everyone, make a dexterity check to try and comb your way through the air enough. Using your body to try and guide your plummeting.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Drei.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It doesn't matter, you're out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Two successes, failure.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm stable! That's right, I'm unconscious! Never mind.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're fine.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Natural 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Jester--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 18 plus.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Success on Jester. For Yasha?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Success, all right! So only one fail. As a group, that is a group success. So you all manage to just-- Yep, and both Jamedi and Avantika are fine. So, you all manage to just barely push your way in a certain direction, you all begin to drift down--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Like a skydiving team?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, slowly making your way through, until eventually the surface of the water, the rushing sound gets louder and louder as you all strike it! As you do, it carries you down in this rapid Goonies-style waterslide, you're all coasting down the side of the stones, and elements of the stone just barely scraping and clipping the back of your butt and your back and you're like "Oh god!", it's not enough to damage you but you're going to be bruised as shit in the morning, but you're coasting down, you can see as the city is coming towards you, the water is now pouring through and snaking through the city-- no pun intended-- there are groups of yuan-ti that have clamored up onto the buildings and are currently trying to pull themselves out of the water and help others get up out of the middle of this strange flood that has taken over the center of their civilization.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The water's still coming, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's still pouring out of the temple it seems.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh my god, the island is sinking.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Potentially, if this an island.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's a turtle's back!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Turtle! It's only a turtle!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's the Cajun turtle!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Orly's vengeance!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You fools!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys coast down, you hit the bottom, and you can see now where the water hits and it snakes through, it curves back to the right and the left, which path are you going to try to guide towards?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Right!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have an unconscious, sledding furbolg.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're sliding me, basically?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I feel like I'm behind you because I've got water walking on, so I'm like--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do it's like (brrrrrrrrr).

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I have keen mind, I would call out exactly the right way to go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's almost like curling!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Thank you for that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I have keen mind, I would know the way that would lead us towards the way we came.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes you would, so you're guiding and shouting directions?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ja! That way! Go that way!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Caleb's guiding you guys, you guys move around the side, riding the water. At this point the flood of water begins to subside a bit. It's still guiding you through, but you can see now the initial burst and rushing of the rapids is not a continuous thing, there is some sort of a tapering to it. You guys just managed to have been there for the initial burst. At this point you guys coast around one side, come round and you're now going down to the center of the street where you previously hid and basically like muscled two of them into a doorway after stabbing and killing them rapidly. You're now gliding through the street along with the flow of the water, trying to keep above the surface. Caduceus being pushed along by little Nott, going (thudding). At this point, from one of the nearby building tops, you see two of these centurion yuan-ti see you guys pass beneath, begin giving out a call, and then shouting over in their direction pointing towards you. Your presence is now aware to at least a handful of nearby yuan-ti. Their weapons were either lost in the stream or not wielded of course, but they're beginning to pull out their things. You guys continue to ride this forward, you're leading the path, the way you can go. I need everybody to make a general acrobatics check to try and guide their body through the water in the direction that Caleb is shouting. This is a group check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Natural 20!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Natural 20! Yasha rolled a five.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Those count as double successes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh my god!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Unnatural 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Still good.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 23, and Jester rolled a 23.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys got this shit, like I don't even-- yeah, you're just out.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Jester's been trying to make her way towards him, if possible. Towards him, I don't know if she can get there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I think-- what did she roll?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She rolled a 23. I mean she rolled a 19 plus four.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll say with that higher roll, she's been able to make her way over towards the side of you guys, coasting along--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: She doesn't actually have anything that can wake me up right now.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She does, she's trying to touch you so she can cast Cure Wounds on you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh my god, she has one left, doesn't she? Holy shit, I forgot about that!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty, so Jester just manages to just make it over to the edge of you as the water, which was about maybe, with the flash flood about three and a half, four feet deep, is now descending to about two foot. So some of you, your feet manage to catch the floor beneath, but the water is still rushing rather fast, you can continue to just go with the flow of it, or try and gather your footing, but it's up to you. You can cast Cure Wounds on Caduceus.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (as Jester) I'm going to cast Cure Wounds on little man.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A d4 plus--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm not even little anymore.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (as Jester) You're always little to me.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh! I'm up, I'm up, oh!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sorry, d8 for Cure Wounds.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're right. One point plus four is five.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're at five hit points, you come into consciousness, on a sled over water.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Did I lose all my hit points when I went unconscious?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, when you're drowning it brings you to zero hit points.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay, I had zero then. Well, fuck.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Riding the water eventually you guys manage to keep it going. Are you going with the water, or are you fighting it?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Might as well go with the flow.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is the water going the way we want to go?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Mostly, yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, I would be calling out this whole time which ways we want to go to get out, ja.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you just continue with the flow of it, the flow eventually comes to a stop on the outside of the city, maybe about 15 or 20 feet from the treeline where you first entered.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Got to go.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Keep moving.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Caduceus in the front, everyone behind him.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to cast-- really quickly since I have nothing else left, I'm going to cast Disguise Self and look like one of the lizard people.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yasha will be actually up front, just in front of you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We need Caleb up front too, to guide us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As a note, all the makeup has been washed off.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, no!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You glance over, now that the water level has stopped you can look behind, and you can see probably two dozen or so yuan-ti have now begun to give chase. They're about a hundred feet behind you, but they saw you exit and they're on their way giving chase. Now we're turning this into a skill challenge chase as you guys are making your way through. As you guys are now charging into the jungle, you're not doing stealth, so your speed isn't as slow, which took you a day and a half or so to traverse this jungle to the center, unless you want to keep stealthy, if it's charging through--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nope.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Run.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Loudest thing you ever heard.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Raiders of the Lost Ark, we're just cutting through the jungle.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Full speed, great. We have six rounds of this challenge.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Six rounds?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct, success and failure do different things. Who wants to offer something to help in this skill challenge? Much like the resurrection challenge in this game, think of a creative way that you can help your progression.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is it going to be dexterity checks?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It depends on what you want to do.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Question, are we under 10 minutes since we shot out the top of that pimple?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're still under 10 minutes, yes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So I'm still sped up, and I'm going to run at the front and just shout out directions and call out holes, things in the ground to look out for. I'm going to lead the charge.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, I will say for that, make a survival check with advantage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. Natural 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's one, who does the next offer?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I was going to say Yasha can take out the Magician's Judge and start cleaving machete-style through the brush, making it far easier for us to move.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, Yasha going to push at the front, which, with a higher speed than you, she can definitely do, and begin to carve through swarths of the jungle to make it an easier passage. For her, make an athletics check, please.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Advantage or straight up?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Straight up, unless she's raging.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, she's rage-clearing!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, I'll allow that for this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right at the end of your Expeditious Retreat, right as the spell is about to fade, you come to that group of vines. At that point you're about to spin and warn everybody, and all you see is this blur of Yasha carve through them. They all fall to the ground, the path before you is open, she goes "Go!" All of you just keep running in that direction. Yasha's continuing that, who's taking the next bit?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll use Thaumaturgy to create the sound of a rushing group of us, but throw it-- happening, I'm going to move us off into the jungle in the other direction. "You can create "instantaneous sound that originates from a point of your choice within range--" This is a rumble, within 30 feet, a rumble of thunder--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, rumble of thunder you can do, it has limitations to the sound you can make, but you can make a rumble of thunder.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I can't make it the cry of a raven-- "such as" is what it says.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, "such as--" I misunderstood what you're saying. Yeah, there are certain sounds you can make, the sound of a whole group--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm making the sound of people rummaging through--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so rustling in the bushes, it makes sense.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes, I'm pushing it away from us and moving us in that direction.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a deception check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Come on, man, not some sucky stuff. Ah! Not bad, 15.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15? That's just barely a success.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll take just barely today.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so with that, you hear the chanting sounds, the war cry of yuan-ti behind you, and it begins to divert slightly, getting them off track just a little bit. All right, who's taking the next bit? Who hasn't offered one?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh there's six of these. I thought there was three.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's six stages of this.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Everyone has to have an offer?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is there anyone tracking us pretty closely yet?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: From what you can tell, not at the moment, but if you wanted to use your turn to do something to see if somebody is. What do you want to do? Your crit earlier gave a lower DC for the next check so that helped out tremendously.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to take the rest of my ball bearings and dump them out as we run.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. As a note, you're in a lush jungle-- Probably not going to do much on this, that's a hard, smooth floor type scenario. I mean, you can if you want to.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Nott, do you have anything you want to offer?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I have one thing, but--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't know if any of my ideas are good.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We don't have eyes on the yuan-ti, do we?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, not at the moment.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I would wait until they get closer before I do my thing. Maybe Jester can--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: There's two dozen of them. I don't want to get that close.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, I don't either, but if they do, I'd be ready for something.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I have something else, but I'd be curious if somebody else has something.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I've got an oil flask. I could drop down some fire but don't think it would work well either.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well sure, so I'll just yell to Beau: Beau! Repeat after me, Fluffernutter! I'm going to throw the keg of gunpowder behind us.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I go: Fluffernutter! and take my ninja star and go (floof)!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, is it on fire? It has to be on fire!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I see it and use the Glove of Blasting to fire three Scorching Rays.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't have fire! I use my fists!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Three Scorching Rays.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have a second level spell to use?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, the glove, I haven't used.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The glove? Yeah you do! That's right, okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I could have used the bottle rockets.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, this is a combined maneuver here. I'd say for the success of this, this is going to be a combination of your-- make a roll with your ranged spell attack--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, there's three rays.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you can go ahead and make a general strength roll.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: General strength? That was my nickname in high school. 15.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nice roll! Okay, you manage to lob it behind with a fair amount of strength so it goes about ten, 15 feet behind you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Then if I can, I would push it with a little Mage Hand, with a little extra top spin on it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, it does a little whirl. It (whoof) through the air and bounds a bit into the jungle behind you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How do I handle this? Is this a skill check?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Are you detonating it just 15, 20 feet behind you? Or are you waiting for something else to come out?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, I'm just waiting for Nott to throwing it back at them, yeah?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct, but they're not visible yet though, you don't know where you are.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well I reacted to Fluffernutter being shouted and seeing it--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So blow it up! We'll make a wall of fire!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So I will track it and then hit it as it struck the ground.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, what did you roll?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, I rolled three times, because there's three rays. Do I use the spell modifier for this, or not?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, so the highest roll was a 20, and then the second highest was a 12, so probably of the three rays, probably only one--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What was the second one? Sorry, 20 and 12 were the two highest?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I rolled a 20, a 7 and a 12.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Got you, okay. So the two hit, so roll damage. The damage is going to be important here, because it is a waterlogged container of black powder and may not be enough to truly ignite or cause an explosion here, or burn through the barrel. We'll see.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But the barrel you said was mostly intact?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's intact yeah, but it's wet.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, but what about inside?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's soaked through a little bit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Barrels are waterproof, you keep beer in them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This isn't a beer barrel.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Total of 12.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That'll be enough. All right, so as it darts behind, you watch the vision of Caleb spinning behind and releasing the glove in front with these three arcs of flame. One of them hits a nearby bush and sets it aflame. The other two, one of them hits the barrel and sends it arcing once more, and the second one hits; it detonates and you guys feel this blast of hot wind behind you as your hair gets blown before your face. The entire jungle around you lights for a moment with bright, yellow-white light, and there in that space now is a couple of trees that have now set aflame, and a section of darkened crater on the ground where the barrel was. The loud blast echoes across the jungle of the island around you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I just turn Beau around like, (shouting) That was amazing! How did you do that with a throwing star?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (shouting) I think these are magic throwing stars! I think I bought magic throwing stars!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll consider that a success. You guys keep rushing. You assume, wherever the yuan-ti were, they're a little unsettled by this large explosion in the direction of where they're travelling, and it slows them down a bit as they try and coast around the area where the damage is. However, there seems to be a lizardmen hunting party now, that is in the jungle a little ways ahead of you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What? Oh jeez.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This thing won't stop!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys have been running for the better part of two hours now; it's a ways through this jungle to get back to the shore. So first and foremost, I need everyone here to go ahead and make a constitution saving throw, please.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: My favorite saving throw.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 23 for Fjord, 20 for Yasha.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: One.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You take a point of exhaustion there, Caleb.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just barely succeeded.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Jester rolled an eight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: One point of exhaustion.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, conditions.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, you're fine.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Jamedi?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Avantika takes a point of exhaustion.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh shit!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. You guys continue onward, since you're just running through this jungle best you can, full sprint, it manages to keep ahead but there is a threat of exhaustion as you continue to move. So, you now begin to hear the sound, this familiar clacking (guttural noises) sound of the lizardmen that you saw in the jungle before. Who's doing what?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughing) That's amazing.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're still doing this?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're still doing it. You had four total successes in the round, you had one critical success which improved--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We hear a hunting party? We see a hunting party?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't see them there, but you hear them in the direction you are. Apparently the noise and the explosion caught the attention of a nearby lizardmen hunting party.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I have these bottle rockets, if you can Mage Hand them away and distract them away from us with another popping sound.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And set them off at the same--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, I can light them, you throw, and you take it further.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure? Yes!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We'll call it--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's do it!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Certainly not the weirdest.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you're doing the exact same thing with a different item. It's going to have a higher DC but you can do it. It's your call.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well gee, when you put it like that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You want to do it?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't know, I feel deeply shamed by my suggestion now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No no, it's a great suggestion! I'm just letting you know, progressively doing the same thing over and over again, it's going to continue to raise the DC.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's no good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a cantrip. Cantrips don't have all that power there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She makes them black.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There you go. Anybody else?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I can try to assume the form of one of the lizard people in case they make eyes on us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I've already done that as well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Two lizardfolk in the group now, all right.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I have no spell left to help.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Doesn't have to be abilities, it can be just whatever you think you would do in the area to help.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I know, you just don't have a lot, you've used all those things.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We hear them?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You heard the hunting call of them.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: In a direction that we can identify?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, somewhere in the front and to the right of where you were as you guys were running through the jungle.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, I'll just say, stay here, and I'm going to put up the hood and I'm going to dodge off in that direction stealthily.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, are you guys stopping for Nott, then?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do I have to roll for stealth, I assume?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes you do, with advantage because of your cloak.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, so that's 22.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you are successfully stealthed, this is not technically a success because this isn't actually helping the endeavor, but you do manage to move ahead, and at your speed you come upon the hunting party. You can see now, there are about six lizardmen with nets, shields, and spears that are currently making their way in the direction of near where your party is currently waiting for you. The more time that passes, the closer the yuan-ti get to your party.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to cast Mage Hand. They're holding nets and what else?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Four of them have shields and spears, and two of them have spears with nets, and the other ones have nets apparently tucked behind their back. They're out here to catch and drag things back.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, Jesus, I got nothing, man. I'm just going to try to Mage Hand and trip the guy in the back with his own net. Just pull it down a little.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, make an arcana check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Arcana check?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes. This is to see if you can influence the magical nature of your cantrip strong enough to try and trip up one of them.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, arcana check is a 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, that's barely a success because that's not a very effective plan, necessarily.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure. Didn't know what else to do, but okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can return, you figure you bought a little bit of time for your party but not much.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I guess that's all I'll do. I don't know what else to do! I-- You know what, I'm going to-- Fuck it! I'm going to cast Message and tell Caleb, go! I'm going to go, hey fucktards, over here! and I'm going to just draw their attention.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh no.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I tell the group, she's doing something stupid. She's distracting them, I have an idea but I don't want to leave her, let's go. I start trudging through the jungle towards the direction I think is the right one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You all continue following Caleb. They are now seemingly turning on you. (snarling)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to bolt, double dash, fast as I can go away.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. You're darting through the jungle--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Not back towards my friends but like--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Kind of in the adjacent direction.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Perpendicular.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's a 15 to hit?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Nope.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And a 12, nope. Both spears (impact) to the nearby trees and you keep running trying to make it through. Eventually, you hear the sound of--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Drink run. Drink and run.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, (gulping) as you're going. You hear the footfalls breaking through of nearby brush and glance over, afraid to see yuan-ti and you can see the shapes of your group, maybe 25 or 30 or so feet to your left.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are we able to tell the direction-- where the lizardmen are, in relation to Nott, or just yuan-ti on us?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not at the moment, you guys are just running. I mean, the lizardmen you knew were off to the front and right, and you guys darted at an angle, and you're guiding them still in the direction toward the--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm saying, we all hear the yuan-ti or Nott hears the yuan-ti coming?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I saw you guys through the woods, but they're behind me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you haven't seen any of the yuan-ti, you've gotten enough gain on them, but they've gotten a bit closer, but they haven't appeared yet.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, but I can tell the direction Nott is running? Or moving?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, you're just--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You've seen us, we haven't seen you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Never mind.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys continue to run, continue to run, continue to run-- Everyone, make another constitution saving throw please.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (groaning)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, okay, okay, okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 12 for Fjord, nine for Yasha.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yasha takes a point of exhaustion, Fjord barely succeeds. DC goes up by two every time we do this.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh fuck, really?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 20, total?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 20? Success. Secondary point of exhaustion, your speed is now halved.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (whisper) Oh my god.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Caleb is now winded, and now starting to drag the group back a bit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: One point of exhaustion, Jester succeeded, I rolled a 14.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 16, she was 16. Ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ten, point of exhaustion, Caduceus.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Anyone who has one point of exhaustion, your ability checks are at disadvantage right now.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Damn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Two points, your speed is halved.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I remember that well.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I have the ability to carry a large amount because of my size, can I piggyback and not get too much of a roll if I throw Caleb on my back?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I will make this one of your checks.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an athletics check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh man.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have disadvantage because--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Or you could have Yasha do it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll have Ya-- yeah, no, that's a better idea, because I was-- five hit points, maybe not.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you share the idea with Yasha, Yasha's going to attempt to--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Athletics?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Does Yasha have a point of exhaustion?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: She does.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So disadvantage on her athletics check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I want to--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's her biggest modifier.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: One second please, because this is going to attribute to her--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, a natural 20 and a 12, so that's 19.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 19! That's a success.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (sigh of relief)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That puts us at six total successes--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh my god--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We're all clear?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Within a few more moments, you break through the treeline and you've found yourself back to the white sand beaches of Urukaxl. There, as you come out to the sand, the hot reflection of the sun against the light. You can see now the sun is close to setting at this point, the sky itself has gotten slowly darker as you've moved past. The white beaches have now come to a faint dull yellow and orange with the coming sunset light. Nott emerges from the nearby brush.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (panting)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She's catching up with the rest of you guys.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (panting) I'm exhausted.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: On the ship! On the ship!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They're right behind me!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys look and there are the two rowboats that are still right where you left them.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yasha's moving towards the beach, Caleb's going to just start firing Firebolt after Firebolt at the treeline, I've a 120 foot range, and is going to set the jungle on fire behind us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay-- I will say, roll an arcana check for me.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Natural one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Unfortunately, as a cantrip, the perpetual fiery quality of it, it can do bursts of damage and plops of flame but unfortunately, the treeline here is too humid, the air here is too wet and none of the trees are catching. However, you manage to get over, Yasha throws you onto one of the two rowboats, you guys get on, too. At this point, you can now see, breaching one side of the treeline, the yuan-ti, the other side, a group of lizardmen. They come to a head and look at each other and look at you. Half of each group charges at each other--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh yes!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: --while the other half begins to charge towards the rowboats.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (groaning) Oh fuck.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: At the rowboat?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (ripcord noises)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How close are they?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're going to catch up-- You guys push off and you're rowing out, you're about ten now, 15 or 20 feet off the edge, they catch up, they start getting their shortbows ready. At this point, you hear (cannon fire)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, yeah, yeah!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh thank god--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Volley that shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (cannon fire) Bursts of sand, columns of sand go flying into the air, and you watch as one lizardman (scream), a yuan-ti bursts off to the side. You look over, you can see the flashes of light on the sides of the Squalleater--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, so sick!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Some of the yuan-ti dive into the water and are now swimming through, trying to come back-- you can see their serpentine bodies making their way in your direction.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Caleb and I are picking them off, Eldritch Blast and--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hitting in the water as you do.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm on the edge, doing polearm duty, like croc hunting.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No! No!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (grunting)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, I'm just--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (groaning)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh my god.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh my god! Why did we not take a short rest right when we started! (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're the one who-- it's your thing!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I know, I know! I didn't think about it, damn it!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. Not feeling that whole time.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Dude, you're good, you're good, you're good. Water is your friend, you're good.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay then, damn!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I've never felt more useless.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh fuck me.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Magical prime time.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That was a teacher.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Curse you!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That was a teacher.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do we really only have mutterfingers--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's only a teacher if we actually learn from these mistakes--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: --blob boffers, and words?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, there's also smudge and--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I have a giant pile of stuff in the other room

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I want Meese's Meanutmutter Mubs! (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's all they had at Smogschmeade!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't even know what that means.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I don't either. Anyway! Friends, we're going to go to our break here in just a moment, we'll return but in the meantime, we have another Wyrmwood giveaway. This fantastic, delightful padauk dice vault, which is magnetized, opens up to keep all your dice, possibly even a couple miniatures in there, well-kept, beautiful orange color for the Halloween season that we're still celebrating today, damn it!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But. Regardless, the winner is fmiller8. fmiller8, congratulations--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: fmiller8, yeah, man!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can we ever not look?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can we just automatically get a short rest, just because that was the most--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, do we just collapse--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: heinous, strenuous--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: of exhaustion as soon as we hit the deck?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nope.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, cool.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She looks at it, closes her fist, closes her eyes, and you feel the rowboat suddenly pick up speed, and you watch as the water and the waves now give an additional thrust like the ocean itself is rising and pushing the boat forward and you watch Avantika open her eyes and smile and looks over at Fjord and goes, "Well, better luck next time, huh?" The boat is now speedboating across the surface of the water, the other rowboat left behind in its wake.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: One die roll, man. One die roll.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: One die roll.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (high-pitched) I said bi--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter) As you approach the outskirts of the Squalleater. The rope ladders are thrown over the edge, down into the water. With that, you all eventually climb up onto the top as some of the crew goes over to retrieve and ratchet up and bring the rowboats back onto the ship. Now you all clamber onto the deck of the large ship and take a moment of respite and breather as your-- the crew of the Squalleater there awaits. You can see there Bouldergut, the large ogre chief, stands there, arms crossed, with the stretched leather tunic now strapped on each side of her torso. Avantika rises and Vera waits, her right-hand, soothsayer-like assistant, or for this, would be considered the deckhand and spiritual leader of this ship.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can I pause you for one second, Matt?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, you may.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did you all fucking take off your costumes?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah...

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, we're still wearing ours. Are--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is that super-glued on or something?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I took mine off.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It got uncomfortable--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, yeah!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It was bad luck.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You have clothes underneath your-- fiber!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do I?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter) That's true, if there was any of us I would not be able to truly--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Uh huh.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: be certain--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: There are imprints being left on that chair.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sticky butt. Peel off, peel off.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Little hearts!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sorry, Matt.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "And I do believe," You see Jamedi sitting on the ground, and goes, "Yes?" "You have earned "what our contract assured you. Please, Vera, if you could retrieve the payment." Vera leaves and in a moment, comes back with a small chest and hands it over to Jamedi, who sets it into his pouch and satchel. He stands up for a second, nods his head, "I hope you understand, that with all "due respect, this is our last time working together." The Captain says, "Aye, I understand, "but it is your loss. There is always more work for you. Where would you like to be dropped off?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: In a graveyard.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At this point Vera says, "Captain, at this moment, it appears that we have maybe 11 days of "supplies, given that our crew has now swelled. As such, we could probably make it back to Darktow to "also complete the repairs on The Mist, as it is seaworthy, but I do not know how long. So that "would be my recommendation. Maybe making a stop or two along the way, whatever's close by." The "captain considers. "Very well, I guess we'll make our way westward onto Darktow to get repairs done, "to supply up, and should you wish to stay, make our way to the next leg of our journey. Who knows? "It seems that you are up for your own rewards to be reaped, eh?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Indeed. Such a mighty display on the way back, I feel like I would be left wanting if I didn't try and pursue the same sort of glory.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Once Uk'otoa is truly free, then the true blessing "can be given."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Captain, may I ask, you knew of this location already. Do you have a lead on another?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hopefully. If not, we'll be sitting here with our "thumbs up our asses, but I've paid well enough, and this person has come through before, so "fingers crossed, eh?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Indeed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Regardless, I think we could all use a bit of rest, eh?" Looks over to Caduceus.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I would be amenable at this point.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Turn around." Some of them-- "Maybe we'll deal with some trade off, eh? Send some of them over to The Mist and maybe you'll stay with me for a while."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We would certainly entertain that very notion. It's hard to think past any sort of a rest.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sorry, I thought that was hypothetical and that we were-- talk about that later, which we should do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Very well. Then we will get some sleep and on the morrow we will discuss how much money we can make together. We'll probably make a stop or two along the way, if you're interested. Bring up the map and see what you want to do. When we've had a bit of rest, maybe a glass of wine."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Of course.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right. Go, rest, sleep. I shall do the same." She walks back into her quarters, Vera staying there on the deck. Jamedi makes his way down to his quarters. What would you like to do?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Go to our quarters, I guess?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Could we have a conversation near the bow of the ship, perhaps? Away from ears? Is it empty towards the bow?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can find a bit that seems a little more remote, but there are deckhands; there are folks that are always keeping watch.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll be right back. You guys find a spot, I'll meet you there. I go back and I go, Jeremiah! Give me that. I take bread or whatever he has prepared.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Portly halfling fellow, and as you're shouting his name, he goes, "Hello? Are you looking for me?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yep, Jeremiah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm Jeremiah. What's your name?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hi. Beau.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Beau, yes. You're one of the new kids. I am making food. Would you--?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What do you have right now? Something ready? I want to chew on something while we talk.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Fine, here you go." He hands over a somewhat stale loaf.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Thank you. You have sausage to go with that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No, they are being prepared, and I wish not to serve something that is unfinished."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Water. Wine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (sighs) Grabs a thing of wine, a small jar, and says, "You can fetch your own water."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Thank you, sorry, I'm just hungry as fuck. I go back to the group.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. You guys patiently wait for Beau to return with a stale--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I got appetizers. There you go.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, that's good. (gnawing)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I should start by thanking all of you for putting yourselves in harm's way again. I did not expect that to go the way that it did, but that seems a repetitive notion at this point.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What the fuck actually happened down there? We haven't really gotten a clear description, and we're all confused.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. I knew when she showed that exuberance at diving down that it was a matter of urgency, and I just couldn't catch her. We made our way down this well into this open, spherical room. At the bottom underneath some algae, there was a recession. It looked like it had space for an orb, like the eye that's in my sword. In my dullardly moment of trying to figure how the fuck I would get it in there, she reached out, and she has the same sort of thing in her hand. She put it in before I could put the sword in. It ripped the eye straight out of her hand. Pulled her hand back and blood was coming out of it; I thought it had done something to her. That's when I saw these arcane-like symbols light up and they shoot across the floor and straight up toward you guys right above the water.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, we saw them.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You saw them come out? What happened?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It connected to the pillars and then that's when everything started flooding. Then it was just running for our lives at that point. I don't know. I didn't see much else.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It was in a hurry, but the type of runes that were in that chamber were one of protection, some sort of ward that I don't understand. It's old. It shook the entire room we were in. I thought maybe there were three locks down there, but you only saw one. Presumably, there are two more places in the ocean or in the world for you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That seems like a lot.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's more than one. There was more than one creature.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: There's also the temple where we found this thing that had the snake, the naga.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: But no recession. I can't remember, when we found the actual cat's eye, the sphere, it wasn't in a recession. Was it just resting at the bottom of the well?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It was just sitting in a pool of water, and you found that amongst other piles. It seemed to be less of a temple and more of a scavenged artifact amongst a merrow den that was expanding beneath the swamp.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We need three onyx eyes, three ivory eyes, three amber eyes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: From three different creatures.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What was the one that was inside of you? Is it the onyx one?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, it was the amber one.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It was the amber one. Oh shit!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. That big serpent with all the eyes like in her captain's--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What was Avantika's?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Amber, yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is it the same color?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yellowish-orange. Just depends on the way the light hits it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So in the amber, it was the giant serpent with the tidal wave.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, the same that she had decorated around her office. That's Uk'otoa. You saw when we were in the boat, she closed her hands and you felt that surge in the water?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I think because she got there first and offered her orb, she was rewarded with some sort of oceanic control or power over water.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She controlled the water?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I think so.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She's the one who made the flood?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, back when we were in the rowboats.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, when we took off. I was curled up in the bottom of the well of the rowboat, cowering, so I didn't see any of that. She got something for giving up her--?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I think so, yeah. I don't know why the water surged out of the temple like that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We also heard a large cracking sound as if a lock had been broken or a wall had been broken.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You said they were protective in nature?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So three murals. Three creatures-- beings. Three chosen ones. And three different eyes in each.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: A creature of the sea, a creature of the air with fire--

lines.name: MARISHA, TALIESIN
lines.text: And a creature of the earth.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do I remember anything from hitting the books in school of some gods?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll a history check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It would be history and not religion?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Actually, history or religion.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, they're the same for me. Same modifier. 17. Her-story!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You recall tales-- I mean, there are many powerful creatures that have existed throughout history, entities that are either elemental in nature or are primal forces of power. There are some that are guardians of the world, some that are guardians of the elements within their own planes. There are many types of horrors and protectors throughout history. Thinking back to some of your studies, both historically and in cracking the tome of the occasional religious thing against your better will in your classes, there are some entities that were left in the wake of the Divergence: avatar-like entities, or at least creations that were meant to be an extension of the power of the gods. Some of them are guardians in the world, some of them still remain true to the religions or the gods that created them. Some, over time, have found their own interests. Some have grown obsessed with their own power without their creator and master to chastise or watch over them, and see themselves as a new god, even. Thinking back, you don't have all the information, but you do know that-- thinking back to the murals and things you've heard about Uk'otoa being said, Uk'otoa was worshipped by the Ki'Nau, which were the indigenous people of the Menagerie Coast and the Swavain Islands in the vicinity. Uk'otoa was one of these avatar entities that was created by Zehir, the Cloaked Serpent, to be one of its many ambassadors of power and one of its greatest warriors in the conflict of the Calamity.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Big kaijus-kind of thing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Essentially. When Zehir and the rest of the betrayer gods were banished along with the other prime deities, they were now the most powerful beings on the surface of Exandria. As such, new religions began to spring up around them. The Ki'Nau of this area took to worshipping Uk'otoa, and Uk'otoa began to preside like the next best god there was. You get the sense that these other two entities might be similar relics of this time: powerful beings created before or during the Calamity and then left with their gods now sealed away to become forces of power of their own. You don't know if they've been sealed in the same fate that Uk'otoa was. But based on what you saw in that temple, they seem to be connected or at least, have similar structure of worship.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: This is some heavy shit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I say all of that. I read this one paragraph once and then the filigree, there was a monk with a trumpet up his ass, and that's why I remembered this section so well. In fact, still remember the book. Bet if we go back to the library, we could still find it and we could figure out more about this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you were to find a place of deep research, you could probably find more information about these entities, yes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That would be a choice.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Speaking of choice, what's yours?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is that your intentions? Is that what you desire?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It feels like she has bigger plans.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm not a crazy person, all right? A giant serpent from the Calamity?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The Divergence, yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, that's some medieval shit. That is bigger than anything I've ever heard of.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So what are we doing?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are we pirates now? Is that the thing? Because I don't like the water at all. I don't want to be on a boat anymore.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I know, and Caduceus, I know your experiences with water have been less than thrilling.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I've actually had a good time. I've died a few times, but I'm great.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think the question really is what we're going to have to do about this. I mean, this is the direction that we're heading. This is what's being put in front of us. I don't know if running headlong into the next temple is the best option. I think maybe if you didn't find the answers you were looking for down in the water, maybe it's time to look somewhere else.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: If I might, Fjord. I don't know much about how this magic works, but if there's three of these things, right, at least three of these eyes that need to be placed to unlock three temples of whatever and release the crazy thing under the ocean. One has been activated, one is inside you, there's one-- maybe we should try to find that one. With that one, we could then safely get the one out of you because we would have the third one and we could go break it somewhere and then we'd know that no one could unlock it ever.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm all for trying to get knowledge out of the captain. She seemed to act like she knew who the third person was, or had been.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And don't get me wrong, she's hot and all, but I question her motives. Feels like she's-- I don't know.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: She looks at him like a skeleton key; she needs him for what she wants.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I agree with that, and I think she's understood that her sexuality can be wielded as a weapon.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I see that, as well. Thank you for the lookout. Frankly, between us, I actually tried to keep her underwater, after. She got away real fast.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, that's fucking brutal.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, and then I had to act like, "No, look at the ground." It was terrible, fucking failed.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All things considered, I think it would be best if we left on good terms.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I agree. I'd like to find out what she knows about the third, and then maybe ask for a bit of respite before we continue. I actually do not feel very comfortable--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's get to port and restock, and that's when we'll figure out--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I doubt she would allow us to leave on any terms.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't know.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: She needs what's in him.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What if we surprise her, tie her up, then Jester can do her Zone of Truth thing. We can find out everything she knows, slit her throat, and sink her ship.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: See, I would be all for that, given the circumstances of what Beau just outlined. Big consequences looming that are age-old, timeless things. But if she can control water now, I would be concerned that that effort might fall short, and then we'd be super fucked. I don't know what her abilities are.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Perhaps some sign of agreement to share information with the understanding that you're both working towards the same goals, and maybe it would be better to have two groups doing this instead of one.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes. I need more info, Caleb. I need more data, more knowledge. You read books on this stuff. There has to be someone out there that knows more about this before we just charge in.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: She's already said that she's sent people out to do this work. It wouldn't be that much different, I suppose.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If we have what she needs, she'll have to play nice.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What if we just leave her? She could go off and do god knows what.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: As opposed to what?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He can stay with her, we can stop it before she does it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I think she's only interested in the one creature, so she's only interested in this type of eye. I don't even want to start to think about the onyx eyes or the ivory eyes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: If we want to leave, we are not going to walk away; we're going to sneak away. She's not going to let go of you. You are a key that she needs. She said herself that greater things come when the serpent is released. The giant, god-like serpent. I would ask you-- we're all here. We like you, and if you are being completely forthright with us, we're good, but if we get the slightest whiff that you are after what this woman is after-- Well, I can't speak for them; I'm not interested in being here anymore.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yasha puts her hand on your shoulder and says, "Faith is a funny thing. Be careful where you place it. It can give strength, or it can lead to terrible things."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm not looking to end them, or the world, by frivolously giving up something that I barely understand. I'd like to try to ask if we can go separate ways and if she says no, I would play that we would join her and her voyages in the morning and then sneak away. I'd like to try and do it amicably, if we can.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't think there's anything wrong with maybe asking for The Mist. I think maybe Caduceus has a good point, if we can convince her that we're still part of her crew by doing our own recon.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: To be honest, it would be worth actually following through with it anyway. She knows things that we don't. We get to find out.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We took all that time to learn how to sail the damn thing.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Also, that boat is fucked and they could shoot us to bloody hell if they wanted to, so it won't be that big of a stretch if we wanted private sleeping quarters.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Third, if she doesn't have a specific location, two ships find that thing faster than one.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Mm-hmm.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's true.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What do you say? We'll have to play along until we get to Darktow, and it is not somewhere that you normally want to go if you're not of the pirate variety.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: None of us have any chance, any other option but to play along.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is this some sort of pirate town?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I think it's a pirate island. It's a hideaway. You don't go there unless you're looking for trouble, or unless you are the trouble.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hee! That's awesome. Speaking of trouble, are you going to take her up on that glass of wine?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Shit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That she has mentioned three times.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, yeah, yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What's Jester doing right now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Fuming.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She's just touching her lips.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Jester's carving something into the bow of the boat and we don't know what. She's got the axe and she's moving it in a direction without looking.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I suppose I should, to keep relations up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, well, you do what you have to.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes. All right, I'll see you all underneath.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait. Take this vial of acid, just in case. I don't know. Maybe she'll try something and you just splash it in her face. I don't know.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: In her face?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I think it just burns.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure, whatever.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is it magic acid?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Nope, just acid.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay. Did you make this?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I did.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Thank you!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Are we now going to go and sleep and properly sleep?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No not until he comes back from his rendezvous.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think I'm going to go to sleep. I don't know about the rest of you. I'm going to pat him on the shoulder and, just for fun, cast Protection from Poison.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ooh!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You've got an hour.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay. All right. Thank you, Caduceus. I'm going to make you a fan of water before your life is done, I swear.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't mind it. I think I just have an issue with the things that are in it and being under it and I'm going to go to sleep and probably, yeah, throw up a little.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't like it at all.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You're going to preach the words of the water.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's terrible.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's really not. I mean, look how good you're doing, right? Thriving. Surviving.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This was the worst day of my life.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I can't leave yet.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Your whole life?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, okay. I'll get back to you on that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll make my way towards the captain's quarters.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're going to figure out a way for you to breath underwater. It's going to be okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, I don't care about being underwater. I just don't like looking at it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Come on.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you guys all go to rest?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, I'm exhausted.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. You guys go to rest.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: A long rest.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You head your way to the captain's quarters?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I do.

lines.name: MATT
