lines.text: All right. You head to the door. It's closed. (knocking) For a moment, you hear this sound of rushing water.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: She's cleaning up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll try the door.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, it opens up. It's the normal office den set up, but there's the balcony out back that opens up, and there on the balcony, Avantika is standing on the balcony and there's this column of water that is rising up out of the ocean. She's nude. It's washing her. She's in the process, in the throes of manipulating this water. She's learning whatever this new gifted power that she has. Her hair is twirling up into the stream and it's this beautiful almost-dance between her and this elemental force that she now has. She looks back over her shoulder at you, knowing that you've been there for at least a couple minutes. "I'll be just a moment."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Don't rush on my account.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Eventually the water splashes down and off the side. She walks back out of the night air and pulls her hair up and ties it off.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I've seen this film.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She takes a little silk robe and places it over her and sits down. There are already two glasses places on the table. She uncorks it and pours two glasses.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: To your success.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "To our success in time, eh?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: One can hope. It's only fair; you've been on this journey far longer than I have.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "This is true." Not the best wine you've had, but it's serviceable.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Not aerated.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I am excited for you to experience this."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I am as well. Is it everything you thought it would be?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I've only but scratched the surface, and I've never felt a connection like this with the "sea that has been my life. It's incredible. I can only do it in bursts, but I can cause it to swell "and move and part and flood and shift. It's-- (sighs). Soon." She reaches out and touches the top of your hand. "Soon. I promise. Now, we were talking before and I think it's only fair." She takes another big sip. "Your blade is very interesting. I knew one other who had a blade very "similar. Referred to it as the Sword of Fathoms."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Sword of Fathoms?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The previous chosen."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can you tell me more about this person who wielded it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "His name was Vandren."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (whispering) Fuck!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "A fine sailor and a foolish coward he ended up to be, but he was the one that... opened my eyes "to the destiny of Uk'otoa. We traveled together for a number of years before he just abandoned and "absconded with something important. I've been trying to find out where he went, but he is very "slippery. Wherever he is, either what you have in your sword is what he took away or wherever he is "he has the third with him."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: This Vandren, you say he told you about the Sword of Fathoms or he had a Sword of Fathoms?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "He carried the same blade."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The same one. Was there an area, a destination, a direction that you last knew that he was going? Is it in our interest to try and find him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It is very much in our interests. We were going to go and visit this very island some time "ago when he was the only one to have one of these orbs."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How did you find, if you don't mind me asking, yours?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well-- I had to kill a number of men. It was being auctioned off in Port Damali, and there "was a collector. Word had gotten to us that this artifact was sold off to this individual. Well, "needless to say, he put up a bit of a struggle."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm sure he did.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "His corpse now adorns one of the many beautiful islands and now I have this beautiful reminder." The hand, you can see, it's now mostly healed over, but there is a scar where this orb once resided in her palm.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll stand and just pace around the quarters, looking at the various iconography of the serpent.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's very interesting that you carry the same "blade as Vandren did and come to me with what could very well be the same orb. Do you know this "one? This Vandren?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't. We should find him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a deception check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (nervous laughter) 23.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Contested! (no audio)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Hmm."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (long sigh) This sword came to me in a very unusual way. I've been a sailor for many years myself and was lost at sea during a storm. When I woke up, I found myself on the shore, and there in the waves next to me was this sword. I don't know how I got there, but as soon as I grasped it, it changed everything. The sword, however, did not have the eye. The eye we found later, my companions and me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Who else was on this ship with you?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Various other sailors. Our captain.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Who was your captain?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Captain Twitchwood. Do you know him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She smiles. "I appreciate that you are a very accomplished liar. But so am I. The only "reason why I still sit here before you with the dozen or so scars I carry is because I have been "very keen at seeing through the same skill."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (high-pitched) A 23 level skill? Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: His name is Captain Wiggledick.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Then I'm sure you can understand the need for secrecy for a small circle.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You know Vandren, don't you?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "And he was on this ship that you shipwrecked on, eh? Do you remember where this "storm was?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I remember where we found the stone.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Do you remember where the storm was?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The storm.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That sunk the ship you were on?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "This was the last time you saw Vandren?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I feel like you know the rest of this story, and I am at a disadvantage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I don't necessarily-- I have not seen Vandren since he absconded with this-- many "things. But he will not travel with both that sword you carry and the orb he stole from us. So "wherever that ship has sunken, there's a very good chance that it has the third missing orb. Do you "remember where the ship sunk?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (sighing)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She reaches out and pulls out a map and rolls it out on the table in before you. Put your map up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, yeah, yeah--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You've got this! (background music, rustling)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Now, between you and I--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: There was a storm-- do I remember?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do recall, actually. It was somewhere coming back along this trade route and somewhere in this space the storm had blown through. This is where it sank and you washed up--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Darktow's over here, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Darktow's over here. You washed up on this island, here.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're over here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys are over there at Urukaxl. You washed up over here, so the storm was in this vicinity.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes, I do remember where the ship sank.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Then, my friend, I think we are going to do even more amazing things together."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I agree. I believe that will have to wait until we find ourselves on Darktow, though.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I have been patient this long. I can be patient a bit further. Very well." She leans forward with the wine glass, very close, and goes, "It's been a very long day. I think rest is in order?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter) I would agree.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She takes a big, long drink of wine, sets it down. "Well, there are ways to complete a hopeful "future pact together. Many different ways." (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (whispering) Yes! Yes! Yes!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Fade to tentacles.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh god, okay. Yep, yep, yep. I will keep Avantika's hand and walk around the desk, and I will try the old lean-in and see what the reaction is.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Man, all right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Quickly, her hand grabs the back of your head and pulls you in.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm very mixed about this whole thing.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: For the sake of brevity... Not the most restful evening you've had, but an evening is had.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How many points of exhaustion?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Make a constitution check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure, go for it, then. That's your own--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Eyy!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (in despair) No... No...

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You succeed the check, but you disappoint your dungeon master.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I wouldn't call it a romantic evening, but a very--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: An adrenaline--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Union of two business partners of a similar goal.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They're both of the sea.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Right in the blowhole.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And we fade to black.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do I make my way back to quarters before sun-up? I don't know if I want to stay the entire evening there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do fall asleep together.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh! Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Unless you choose to not wish to.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, I'm not going to stay. You don't walk out of the captain's quarters at sun-up. Plus, I'm super tired. I will leave and try to stealth back to the quarters of everyone else.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I have a passive perception of 18.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hopefully you're super asleep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll a stealth check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Come on, copper dice gods. 18.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. You carefully and quietly tiptoe your way through the hallway to your assigned quarters, of which you are sharing with whom?

lines.name: TRAVIS, MATT
lines.text: Caduceus.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: One eye slowly opens as you are keen to be somewhat aware-- living alone, out in the dangerous wood-- to any sort of aberrant noise in the vicinity. You hear the faint creak of very gentle footsteps as Fjord makes his way into your chambers.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can I figure out what happened just by looking at him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (giggling)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Sleep well with your bad decisions.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you all rest, a long rest at sea, as the Squalleater and The Mistake make their way towards Darktow to the far west, we'll end tonight's game there and pick up there next week.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Aw, no, what?!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (exclamations)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Cheers!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Aw, that's a great ending. That's a good finish.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: To that degree, while I have you guys here, let's roll some hit points for those who are present.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do we recover our exhaustion?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Over the next couple of days you will because this is a multi-day travel to get to Darktow, so your points of exhaustion will be gone by the time it matters.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll let Yasha roll for hers.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I should probably roll for Laura. What do you think? You think she'll appreciate that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's your head, man.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: d8 for me, right? Five.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: d8 for me as well.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Pitiful.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's a d8 plus your constitution, yeah? Wow, that's a one. Do we still reroll ones?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We reroll ones for hit points.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's a two!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Nice!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's better.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Thanks.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: One. Eight!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There you go, Nott.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So I reroll a one?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I reroll ones for hit points, because rolling a one for hit points at a level up is the fucking worst.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Rolling a d8, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What'd you get, Caleb?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I rolled a two, so a con bonus gets me to four points up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Four more hit points.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Six.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Six points to you. To be fair, you guys have been rolling fucking great for hit points for many levels. It's time for there to be some balance.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I feel like I should reroll this again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No! Take a good one, dude!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (sighing)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Stop fighting a success!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I rolled a two--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (growling) I rolled good at hit points. This is bullshit! You're so weird, Sam!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It just feels cheap.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How does it feel cheap?!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Because I rolled a one first!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's how I do it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What do I get at level seven?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The union of partnership of Captain Avantika and Fjord and the imminent Darktow in your future.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Seamen, seamen, everywhere.

lines.name: SAM, TALIESIN
lines.text: (background chatter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (cheering) (no audio) [music]
